Select Page

As a first of its kind, OIGETIT revolutionizes online search by delivering comprehensive real-time results in a blink of an eye. With its advanced web search, you discover immediate, trending, and revealing information about any person, place, or thing. You become instantly exposed to the latest local, national, and world news. Simply stated, OIGETIT is a dynamic search engine with real-time, trending and sentiment features.

Let’s explore further:

BENEFIT #1: Real-Time results – Information you want

OIGETIT delivers easy-to-view results so you can find what you are looking for in seconds, rather than spending hours navigating a multitude of irrelevant search result pages. Out of millions of pages of information on the web, OIGETIT captures, reads, and delivers to you the exact information you need in seconds. And it’s constantly scanning the web for newly released information.

BENEFIT #2: Trending indicator – What is in demand now

Google, Bing, and Yahoo deliver results based on website rankings, while OIGETIT offers trending results about what is in demand now within any local, national, or global community. Current search engines show you static information about popular websites, while OIGETIT delivers fresh and relevant information that is gaining momentum about your specific search and indicates whether the coverage is emerging or declining.

BENEFIT #3: Social Sentiment – Attitude or opinion about it

OIGETIT detects patterns of behavior and social sentiment in real-time by monitoring the Internet, interpreting these metrics, and delivering sophisticated analysis and data in seconds. OIGETIT uses artificial intelligence and machine learning to inform you of the social attitude and opinion about your subject, and how it’s changing in real-time from positive to negative or vice versa.

From a global perspective, OIGETIT provides a profile of any keyword by understanding the keyword and geospatial relationship. Using advanced natural language processing, OIGETIT monitors keyword influence across the globe over time. By using custom algorithms and compression technology, it understand how a keyword is cross-linked with each other, and the relationship between time and sentiment.


As a first-mover, OIGETIT offers you a truly dynamic search engine that provides comprehensive, trending, and sentiment-based results. You no longer have to accept the chaotic, static, and irrelevant search results that other search engines offer. OIGETIT immediately improves your life, since you rely so heavily on online search results for recommendations, socializing, and sharing. With OIGETIT, the power of search is back in your hands!
